strings: <se_low>King Trode: Now, form an image in your mind of what you'd like to make, and choose the ingredients carefully.
<se_low>King Trode: Perfect timing, <leader>! While you've been asleep at night, I've been burning the midnight oil again to improve the alchemy pot! Look!

<se_low>King Trode: I've made a break[-]through!
You're no longer restricted to two ingredients.
You can use up to three at a time now!

<se_low>King Trode: Now you can make even more exciting items.
What a boon to your alchemy studies!
No, no, you can thank me later.
<se_low>King Trode: So you'd like to make <val_0> <PLR_I_NAME_0>, would you?
<se_low>King Trode: So you'd like to make <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>, would you?
<se_low>King Trode: So you'd like to dabble with an unknown recipe, would you?

<se_low>King Trode: Ah, the moment of truth! I can hardly wait.
Let's see what you've concocted!
<se_low>King Trode: It's looking good. Well done!
<se_low>King Trode: Now what have we here? Why, if I'm not mistaken, <IF_SING val_0>that's <INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0><ELSE_NOT_SING>those are <INDEF_ART_PLR_I_NAME_0><ENDIF_SING>! Well done, <leader>!

<se_low>King Trode: You've created <IF_SING val_0>a rare item indeed.
This is the first specimen<ELSE_NOT_SING>some rare items indeed.
Those are the first specimens<ENDIF_SING> I've ever seen!

<se_low>King Trode: Jolly good show! Keep it up!
I'm looking forward to seeing more of your work!

<se_low>King Trode: Your alchemy skills are improving, I see. <IF_SING val_0>
That's another exceedingly rare item<ELSE_NOT_SING>Those are some other exceedingly rare items<ENDIF_SING> you've made!

<se_low>King Trode: What's this!? You've made <IF_SING val_0><INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0><ELSE_NOT_SING><val_0> <PLR_I_NAME_0><ENDIF_SING>!? Well, even common items have the power to impress when they're home-made! Good show!
There are no items in the bag.
<Cap><string_0> is not carrying any items that can be used as ingredients in the alchemy pot.
There are no items in the bag that can be used as ingredients in the alchemy pot.
